short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds people who paid for Twitter blue and replaces their coverted verified badge with a simple smiling Elon Musk face

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wondered how many people pay for Twitter Blue? Now you can! Simply install this extension and watch as checkmarks gained simply by subscribing to a subscription plan are replaced with an Elon head!

This extension leaves genuinely verified users untouched and alters just the appearance of Twitter Blue subscribers.

This changes the game entirely giving a fresh outlook quickly on conversation threads.

Based on easytwitterverifies' incredible work on "Real Twitter Verifier"
